On Fri, 9 Apr 2004, Ahuja, Mona R wrote:

> I need to mock the Connection object of the java.sql package. For this
> I used the com.mockobjects.sql.Connection2 mockobject. Now the problem
> is , i have to make the rollback method of the mocked connection to
> throw an exception. Is there any way I can do that.

What's the difficulty with something like this?

	Connection connection = new com.mockobjects.sql.Connection2() {
	    public void rollback() throws SQLException {
		throw new SQLException("for testing");
	    }
	}
	// Use the connection in the test.
